ansi_aware_handler <- function(x, options) {

        "<pre class=\"r-output\"><code>",

        "</code></pre>"
    )
}

knitr::knit_hooks$set(
    output = ansi_aware_handler, 
    message = ansi_aware_handler, 
    warning = ansi_aware_handler,
    error = ansi_aware_handler
)
